name: Animate
description: Use objects as puppets, D6 of them per cast.

name: Area
description: Affects all targets in arm’s-width radius.

name: Duration
description: Upgrade from 1D6 phases to 1 full round.

name: Dominate
description: Control a target if effect > target roll.

name: Dice Upgrade
description: Upgrade a damage or effect die by one grade.

name: Powerful
description: Add an additional die or bonus to a spell’s roll.

name: Shield
description: Create a barrier that absorbs damage.

name: Transport
description: Teleport target up to effect x 10 ft.
